data.description:
traVRsal lets you move using your own feet. Build & play a constantly growing collection of exciting free-roaming experiences right in your living room to experience a new level of immersion. 

Using intuitive level design and the clever use of play-space - be it big or small - traVRsal untethers the limits of VR making players feel as if they are freely walking through expansive worlds.

Adventure through procedurally created magical dungeons filled with puzzles, traps and enemies. Climb mysterious towers. Visit stunning galleries. And much more! Become the best in each world for your place on the global leaderboard.

Built with modding at it's heart: There is a creative community to help build your own free-roaming VR games with an easy to learn world builder, and share the work with other players.

Supported third party integrations: bHaptics, Unsplash, GIPHY, Ready Player Me, Meta Avatars

Required play-space: 1.5 by 1.5m (4.9 by 4.9ft)

changelog.change_log: Reenabled Quest 1 support
Fix potential hanging or crash when entering portals from passthrough

* Passthrough support in menu and at world start
* Gallery supports continuous passthrough
* Set passthrough active per default if it was default in home
* Increased performance, prioritize GPU
* Upgraded complete technology stack to state of the art
* Upgraded bluetooth support to fix broken bHaptics support introduced with latest Quest updates
* Upgraded Vivox to fix broken voice chat in multiplayer
* Fix potential initialization issues when using EnemyBehaviors with waypoints
* Fix random materials in mazes not working
* Fix some transition glitches
* Many new studio features & capabilties

* Support Meta avatars! Select either Ready Player Me or Meta as your favorite avatar representation, switch as you like
* Avatar mirror to preview your avatar
* Support left-handedness, auto-switch main hand in menu when pressing buttons of other controller
* The Tower:  Four new additional chapters of epic proportions, exciting climbing passages & Small fights, elaborate pathways to find and untangle, new sound effects, added more traps and obstacles, big performance improvements
* Hunt the Button: Many improvements on flow and look & feel, small mazes as transitions between rooms, more grabbable objects in earlier levels, timed zone for Steampunk and Cuddly Critters, new sound effects
* Training Ground: Drones will be patrolling the outside, many improvements to outer scenery, doors adding much more tension to the game
* Add fog in selected worlds for improved atmosphere
* A multitude of new [world building features](https://github.com/WetzoldStudios/traVRsal-sdk/releases) (from back until June)
* Main menu & Settings simplifications
* New "Connecting" state while not fully ready for Multiplayer
* Show more guidance when creating user reports
* Make complete highscore and online statistics handling asynchronous
* Creates less hick-ups while playing, supports playing offline and uploading highscores once connected again
* Show updated leaderboard score after finishing a run
* Support showing leaderboard explanations in exit screen
* Big performance improvements all-over (main menu, game and world editor)
* Skip loading unrelated chapters in case they are independent, resulting in a huge performance and memory boost during loading
* Show loading information in leaderboards
* Enable music ducking when speech is played
* Press h in PC version to toggle hands visibility
* Fix replayed worlds reporting wrong statistics
* Fix achievement handling on non-Oculus platforms
* Fix sending statistics twice
* React gracefully to disk full
* Don't take damage when not in-game
* Fix transition sometimes not fully deactivated by variable
* Upgrade Voice package, most likely fixing connection issues some players reported

* Giant world builder update: more than 200 new features.
* Achievements! A variety of over 20 initial achievements, for completing worlds, unlocking secrets, walking and more
* Single unlock & counting achievements (e.g. distance walked)
* Some secret achievements only visible when unlocked
* Visible in Oculus profile
* Introduction of paid worlds and chapters
* Selected worlds or chapters can now be priced
* Available to community worlds soon
* Ability to show testimonials, provide free chapters, demo worlds and more
* Supporter Package option for players who want to support the development of the game
* Will show a heart in the leaderboards for supporters
* Integrate User Reporting to quickly reproduce potential issues
* Option to explain leaderboards
* Always allow nickname entry when not on an Oculus version
* Performance improvements in-game and in the menu
* Support collecting highscores while offline and uploading them once online again
* Fix latest score not being displayed in exit zone
* Fix a case of enemies getting stuck
* Fix enemy not moving anymore suddenly
* Fix The Mansion puzzles not being solveable
* Fix SpaceMan drones being way too low

* Support for Quality Rules so that worlds will run without the need to manually tweak settings on lower end devices
* Faster start-up
* Reduce avatar and overall memory consumption
* Compress gallery images on devices with fewer memory (Quest 1)
* Performance improvements
* Resize imported images automatically, making Gallery usage much simpler and not causing out of memory exceptions
* Remove Halloween theming again
* Fix lever behavior
* Fix post effects for health not fully resetting
* Fix potential flickering for Gallery images from device
* Fix multiplayer area being sometimes unaligned
* Fix starting point not being possible to determine in initial zone after first death
* Catch more corner cases of elements that could be removed to save memory
* Fix voice chat not working for rooms with special characters or blanks in the name
* Fix health not being reset after dying from falling
* Fix covers not updating after cache period expired
* Ensure combo resets are properly synched in multiplayer
* Fix some multiplayer players seeing tiny play-area
* Fix shielded enemies crossing portals

* Multiplayer !!!
  * Play together with friends, private rooms
  * Voice chat
  * Use your [Ready Player Me](https://travrsal.readyplayer.me/) avatar, short-code support
  * Synchronized articulated hands
  * Synchronized logic (buttons, levers, puzzles)
  * Co-operative play mode
  * Join a running game late
  * Special handling: wait for all players to load the game before showing intro zone, support host changes, disconnect/reconnent...
  * And much more planned in the near future, please give feedback and share ideas
* Performance enhancements
  * Big performance increase in zones that require puzzle solving before getting to the next
  * Much faster world loading if no dynamic spawning or moving agents are required
  * Much smoother worlds, especially the Pyramid
  * Optimized physics
  * Smoother menu
* Make gallery from device sorted randomly by default
* See additional downloads progressing during loading (instead of static universe screen)
* Adjusted pit in Pyramid so that respawn tile is guaranteed to not be a trap

* Show animated path walked after reaching exit
* Halloween menu theming
* Initial app start now also shows loading screen
* Removed default game over speech, reduced outro music volume
* Fix dropped objects cannot be regrabbed sometimes
* Fix incorrect target count
* Fix world upload retries not working
* Fix world upload not being able to cope with aborted uploads
* Fix player not being able to return to main menu in rare cases
* Many additional fixes all over
